name: Reclamation (itch) (groggydog)
description:
[Created in one month as an entrant for the Interact-If Story Jam 2022]

This is a story-heavy TEXT ADVENTURE game which uses three primary commands (LOOK, TAKE, and USE) alongside directions (NORTH, SOUTH, EAST, WEST [alternately N, S, E, W]), and interactive choice menus.

The game can be completed in roughly 90 minutes (give or take, depending on reading speed and how much you want to explore). Thanks to Adventuron, your browser will automatically save your progress, so feel free to come back!

This game is also mobile-friendly.

Type "TUTORIAL" at any time for an overview of the available commands and instructions.

A walk-through can be found here if you happen to get stuck.

CREDITS

  • Created by groggydog in the Adventuron Engine
  • Milky Way Galaxy During Night photo by Hristo Fidanov
  • Magic Square Puzzles from DadsWorksheets.com
  • Playtesters / Puzzle Solvers:  booktorious, Chris Hay, jbeebs305 / AsenathBernkastel, Bondman006, Dee Cooke, Garry, Shiroke
